There was one other sighting in Abilene on or around October 28th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting on my back porch and looking at the sky, when out of the corner of my eye, i caught a glimpse of lights and looked over to the southeast and saw two big like headlights, huge star-like, ....... at an angle going like \ but more straight.......they were both there a minute and then the one on the right started to diminish slowly to nothing and then the second one on the left started to diminsh slowly to nothing and they were just totally gone........... they were not blinking, not a shooting star, no tail, just like two big bright white lites........
